title: Not enough PROJECT cores
body: So the new PROJECT skins came out today and i was watching you YouTube videos on the the whole system with the PROJECT cores and blueprints and augment caches and from what i watched you had enough PROJECT cores to use for at least one of the blueprints for the champions icon and loading screen border but from what i can see there is only 4 chests in total besides from 5 there is Augment caches, EM caster icon (Ashe) Hyper Edge icon (Kat) and Decrypter icon (Ekko) but where is DISRUPTION icon (Yas) because of it not being there there is no way to get any of the icons or loading screen boarders without sending rp im guessing this is intended in order to spent more money but from what i watched you could at least have one unlocked with out spending rp #Feelsbadman

replies.body: Are you feeling alright? Look at my icon. I didn't pay a single dollar for it. The 3 chests that you can buy (Edit : WITH IP), you get 3 components from - PROJECT : Ekko/Ashe/Katarina First Strike Icon Blueprint. When you craft that icon, and if/when you buy the PROJECT skins, you will get a border. Please read the FAQ next time before complaining. People like you give EUNE a bad name, like it wasn't bad enough to begin with.

Incorrect.  The cores you receive from the chests are random.  After opening all I only have 5 cores, not 7.   The event isn't over anyway, but you don't automatically receive 3 cores  per the 3 basic chests.

The PROJECT: DISRUPTION event has just begun, as we are only in phase 01, and there are more opportunities to unlock content. Phase 02 will be releasing on the 9th with the Disruption Cache that will encase 7 Project Cores and much more. For complete details on the entirety of the event, check out our [Promo Page.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/project-2016/content/crafting)

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bNEJY8uI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-02T22:05:39.080+0000)
>
> The PROJECT: DISRUPTION event has just begun, as we are only in phase 01, and there are more opportunities to unlock content. Phase 02 will be releasing on the 9th with the Disruption Cache that will encase 7 Project Cores and much more. For complete details on the entirety of the event, check out our [Promo Page.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/project-2016/content/crafting)
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Are we able to get PROJECT: Cores from playing the game like keys or do we have to get the caches?

PROJECT cores can only be obtained through the event caches. Our [PROJECT: DISRUPTION FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) goes into a bit more detail on this.
i mean its not even out in NA yet... so theres that.
